snippet: The founder of a medical marijuana training school said Friday that he was giving up his marijuana businesses in downtown Oakland after a federal raid this week.
abstract: Richard Lee, founder of a medical marijuana training school, says that he is giving up his marijuana businesses in downtown Oakland, Calif, after a federal raid on his training school, a marijuana dispensary and his home.
lead_paragraph: The founder of a medical marijuana training school said Friday that he was giving up his marijuana businesses in downtown Oakland after a federal raid this week.
